title: גיק ג'וב: אוסף משרות היי-טק חמות במיוחד - 19 בנובמבר
description: גם השבוע אספנו עבורכם את המשרות החמות ביותר בהיי-טק הישראלי, על-מנת לעזור לחברינו שמחפשים משרה חדשה. בין משרות השבוע: מומחה Ruby/Java, ראש צוות אבטחת מידע, Full stack marketing manager ועוד
articleBody:
גם השבוע אספנו עבורכם את המשרות החמות ביותר בהיי-טק הישראלי, על-מנת לעזור לחברינו שמחפשים משרה חדשה. בין משרות השבוע: מומחה Ruby/Java, ראש צוות אבטחת מידע, Full stack marketing manager ועוד

אחת המטרות לשמן ייסדנו את גיקטיים היתה לקדם את קהילת ההייטק בארץ. בפוסט הגיקג’וב השבועי, אנחנו מפרסמים חלק מהמשרות המפורסמות בלוח משרות ההייטק החדש של גיקטיים. אם אתם מעוניינים למצוא משרות נוספות או לפרסם משרות שלכם, אתם מוזמנים לעשות זאת באמצעות לוח המשרות החדש שלנו – Geeklist. שתפו את הפוסט והעבירו הלאה כדי לעזור לחברות להפיץ את המשרות ולגולשי גיקטיים למצוא את העבודה החדשה שהם מחפשים.
התפקיד כולל תמיכה ושירות לעובדי החברה בסביבה מרובת משתמשים.
מתן פתרונות תקשורת, טיפול בתקלות. מדי פעם יציאה לשטח לצורך טיפול בתקלות בסניפים.
נכונות לעבוד במשמרות (9:00-18:00 / 10:00-19:00 / 11:00-20:00) ומשמרות של ימי שישי (חופש באמצע שבוע, במידה ועובדים בשישי).
כוננות של 24/7 בתשלום.
דרישות:
עדיפות לבוגר: MCSA ,MCITP עם הסמכות.
ניסיון קודם – יתרון משמעותי.
ידע בתחום הרשתות. והחומרה.
ניסיון בפתרון תקלות ב-Office, Windows 7.
ידע ב-Active Directory, Office 365, DNS, DHCP.
ידע ב-PBX FREE – יתרון.
אנגלית ברמה גבוהה.
לשליחת קורות חיים למשרת IT – HELPDESK

ניהול צוות האחראי על תפעול שותף של מערך ההרשאות, עבודה בסביבה מרובת מערכות ותמיכה והטמעה של פרויקט IdM ארגוני. התפקיד מצריך עבודה מול גורמים טכנולוגיים ועסקיים כאחד, יכולת הנעה והובלה של פעילויות לקידום מערכות חדשות בצד ניהול המשתמשים וההרשאות.
דרישות:
ניסיון של לפחות שנתיים בניהול צוות.
ניסיון בהובלה והטמעה של תהליכי עבודה.
ניסיון רלוונטי בתחום מערך ההרשאות.
היכרות עם מערכות SAP – יתרון.
היכרות עם מערכות AS400 – יתרון.
הכרות וניסיון בעבודה עם צוותי פיתוח .
יישום ותפעול שוטף של תשתית מרכזית לניהול מערך משתמשים והרשאות אל מול מערכות הארגון.
לשליחת קורות חיים למשרת ראש צוות אבטחת מידע
Join an amazing full stack tech marketing services company that serves the most innovative early stage companies out there. Help startups skyrocket their launch and scale up, globally. Areas of responsibility: Strategic marketing, marketing project management, global PR, content marketing, online / mobile campaigns, media buying and tracking, SEO, mobile-app marketing, data driven analytics and much more. Yeah, stretch up your skills.
Requirements:
Native / superb English speaker (English only resumes please! Interviews will be held in English) – work will include writing in social channels and professional blog posting.
Social animal (like really!) including Twitter.. Instagram.. LinkedIn.. Facebook and more
Online / Mobile / Tech products marketing experience a must! (We don’t care if it’s 2 or 5 years, you get the idea).
Analytics and reporting expertise a must- We are after a data driven professional, who can track the behavior of users / visitors and optimize conversions.
Excellent presentation skills – You will need to present / train entrepreneurs and run marketing workshops.
Techy sole. Passionate about mobile, online and tech products.
We’d love it if you also have / are:
Previous experience with mobile / online advertising campaigns – FB, Google, Twitter and specific ad networks.
Previous experience with content writing / editing / distribution – Both organic and paid (Yeah, techy content for geeks like us).
Previous experience with online / mobile analytics platforms such as Google analytics, Mixpanel, etc.
A VB, Techcrunch, Geektime, TNW, BI reader on a daily basis. You goatta know what’s going on.
A mingling kinda guy. Someone who feels comfortable at industry events, charismatic and impressive.
To send a CV for the position of Full stack marketing manager

Ninja iOS developer wanted for a startup that will change the world!
Located in the heart of Tel Aviv, in Rothschild Avenue, with espresso, sushi at noon & hipsters on the street. BEEN THERE DONE THAT. PapTap is not just any startup.
Elite technology squad with the cause of making small businesses lives happier.
Offices are fun & cool in Or Yehuda with parking for all, unaware hipsters & without the traffic. So instead of waking every morning into the daily Tel Aviv chase, wake up with a smile & come home – to us.
Requirements:
The Ninja must have honor and:
BA/BS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject.
At least 2-3 year of experience with native (Objective C) iOS applications development on Xcode platform.
At least 3 published running apps in portfolio.
Deep understanding of the full mobile development life cycle, actual experience with OOP in Objective C, Memory Management, iPhone/iPad Utilization, Social Integration, Client-Server, SQLite, Delegation, Storyboards, Core Animations, Core Data, FMDataBase, UIDynamics, OpenGL.
Collaboration abilities with cross-functional teams to define, plan, execute and ship new features.
To send a CV for the position of Lead iOS Developer
A successful, fast growing Internet company located in Ramat Gan is looking for a .Net Developer.
Requirements:
Knowledge in MS SQL database, including schema design, writing queries and stored procedures.
5 years of software development experience, 3+ using C# .Net framework 2.0 or higher.
At least 3 years’ experience with OOD/OOP & Design pattern.
At least 3 years working experience in development team.
At least 1 year experience with ASP.NET.
Highly proficient or mother-tongue English.
BSC Degree – mandatory.
Good interpersonal relationship and teamwork skills.
Achievement-oriented, hard worker.
“Out of the box” thinker.
Autodidactic skills.
Please include the positon number in the e-mail headline.
SafeCharge is proud to be an equal opportunity employer.
To send a CV for the position of Dot Net Developer
Manage the product department;
Collaborate to define the product vision, strategy and business model;
Own game metrics and ensure success and growth of the product;
Drive the product roadmap from beginning to end;
Identify opportunities for key initiatives to enhance the customer experience;
Define requirements, drive customer experience projects, and work with all relevant cross-functional teams to guarantee smooth, efficient implementation;
Own feature definitions, detailed requirements, business process changes, internal communications, and implementation plans;
Drive optimization planning and monitor current initiatives: define testing protocol (A/B, multi-variant, etc.), set up process using optimization tools, write test projections and forecasts, and measure performance to report on variances and recommendations;
Manage ongoing maintenance and enhancement of product features.
Requirements:
5+ years of experience in product management in social-networking, or game development is a must, mobile product management experience is an advantage.
3+ years of experience in managing a product department – a must.
Gaming company experience – great Advantage.
Experience in B2C – a must.
Experience in working with R&D offshore – an advatange.
Proven ability to partner with cross-functional disciplines, and to influence effectively.
Experience creating wire frames for feature development, including reporting and tracking tools.
Experience with A/B testing – an advantage.
To send a CV for the position of VP Product
The full stack developer will join our core web application team, and take a central role in building the customer-facing web application. The developer will be responsible for end-to-end design and implementation of major features, Mainly focusing on server-side Java with a dash of client-side, giving our customers clarity and control over an advanced big-data security analysis solution.
Requirements:
Great enthusiasm for clever technology and getting things done.
Great interpersonal skills – a must.
3+ years of experience with modern web application technologies.
3+ years of experience in Java application backend development.
Proven ability to translate product requirements into successful features.
Experience in AngularJS or similar technologies – an advantage.
To send a CV for the position of Full Stack Developer
Our technology-driven Internet Company is looking for a hardcore Ruby/Java Expert to join our talented R&D team and work on our core server/application products
Responsibilities:
Develop our next-generation distributed, web-based systems.
Lead and deliver high scale projects from end to end.
Gather product and technical requirements.
Write unit and integration tests; collaborate with QA automation.
Design system deployment and configuration for continuous
integration.
Be responsible for monitoring integration and smooth production
operation.
Design and write code primarily using: Ruby on Rails; HTML/CSS;
JavaScript and Ajax while working in Agile methodology.
Work with Big Data using NoSQL technology (e.g. Mongo,
Cassandra, etc.).
Requirements:
At least 8 years of experience with Java/RoR/PHP development.
Experience with project design, coding and release to customers.
Experience with Agile development, including continuous integration, continuous deployment and coding for automated testing.
Extensive experience with Server-side technologies such as: ActiveRecord; Ruby; ROR; HTTP Protocol; etc.
Experience with application servers such as: Nginx, Apache, Unicorn.
Proficient in POSIX based environments such as Linux or Mac OS X.
Bonus Points:
First-hand experience in Test-Driven Development.
Experience with NoSQL systems (MongoDB, Couchbase, etc.).
Experience with designing and coding large scalable systems.
Experience with developing web applications: JS, HTML, CSS, AJAX, REST, JQuery, Angular.
To send a CV for the position of Ruby/Java Expert

“Game Changer” is what we often hear from our customers. This is a rare opportunity to join a young startup and become part of the core team. We offer a competitive salary and options plan.
Reactful serves more than 50 million visitors each month, empowering our customers’ websites with the latest in conversion patterns. Our “collaborative learning” technology processes droves of data from each customer and reaches deep conclusions on visitor behavior patterns and the appropriate reaction to them.
Technology Snapshot: Google Cloud, Google App Engine (Python), BigQuery, BigTable, Prediction API, Proprietary Machine Learning algorithms
Javascript, CSS, HTML, AngularJS, JQuery, Ajax & DOM manipulations, Responsive Web
Tech we didn’t think about and you like.
We are a young, small and vibrant startup with well-known paying customers and are looking to grow massively in the upcoming year. Since we spend lots of time at work, we also value our working space & atmosphere.
5 things to know about us @Reactful: We-
Are a global company. We work out of Palo Alto CA & Tel Aviv
Serve well known paying customers from around the globe who love our product
Are funded by serious investors who deeply believe in what we’re building
Work with cutting edge tech that is redefining an industry (and is interesting to build out)
Value our work space and invest heavily in a techy (nerdy?), fun environment
Requirements:
Exceptional learning skills and a can-do attitude.
Experience with big data and cloud development.
Significant programming experience and Python in particular.
Experience with Front-end development – Advantage.
Motivation to become a team leader in the future – Advantage.
To send a CV for the position of Full Stack Developer
